**Electric Toothbrush with Built-in UV Sanitizer and Smart Sensors**:    The electric toothbrush features a built-in UV sanitizer that can eliminate 99.9% of bacteria and germs on the toothbrush head, ensuring a clean and hygienic brushing experience. Additionally, the toothbrush comes equipped with smart sensors that track and analyze brushing habits, providing personalized feedback to improve oral hygiene and prevent dental issues.

**Whitening and Cleaning Electric Toothbrush with Advanced Nano-Tech**:    This innovative toothbrush uses advanced nano-tech to remove tough stains and plaque, revealing a brighter and healthier smile. The toothbrush head is infused with nano-particles that break down and lift away stains, while the built-in whitening agent helps to restore the natural whiteness of teeth.

**Electric Toothbrush with AI-Powered Brushing Assistant**:    This intelligent toothbrush features an AI-powered brushing assistant that provides real-time guidance and feedback to ensure a thorough and effective brushing experience. The AI assistant analyzes brushing habits and adjusts the brushing pattern and duration to meet individual needs, promoting optimal oral health and preventing dental issues.

**Water-Flossing Electric Toothbrush with Advanced Sonic Technology**:    This revolutionary toothbrush combines the benefits of water flossing and sonic technology to provide an unparalleled cleaning experience. The toothbrush head uses advanced sonic waves to remove plaque and debris, while the built-in water flossing feature helps to reach deep between teeth and below the gumline, promoting healthy gums and a clean smile.

**Electric Toothbrush with Integrated Oral Health Coach and Gamification**:    This engaging toothbrush features an integrated oral health coach that provides personalized guidance and motivation to improve brushing habits and promote optimal oral health. The toothbrush comes with a gamification feature that rewards users for consistent brushing and good oral hygiene practices, making oral care a fun and rewarding experience.
